name: Kraken Robotics Inc.
description: Kraken Robotics Inc. is a leading marine technology company focused on delivering innovative underwater robotic solutions for various industries, including defense, oil and gas, and oceanography. Founded in 2013, Kraken has established itself as a pioneer in advanced sonar technology and autonomous underwater vehicles (AUVs). The company's flagship products include the ThunderFish AUV, which offers exceptional performance in underwater mapping, inspection, and surveying. Kraken's proprietary sonar technology, including high-resolution synthetic aperture sonar (SAS), enables users to achieve unprecedented clarity and detail in underwater imaging. With a commitment to research and development, Kraken is continuously enhancing its product portfolio to meet the growing demands of the marine industry while ensuring safety and efficiency. The company also provides software solutions that integrate with its hardware, allowing for seamless data collection and analysis. As global interest in underwater exploration and resource management rises, Kraken Robotics remains at the forefront, helping clients navigate complex underwater environments and make informed decisions. With an emphasis on sustainability and advanced technology, Kraken is poised to play a critical role in the future of marine operations.
headquarters: St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada

seo.meta_title: Kraken Robotics Inc. | Marine Technology and Robotics Solutions

faq.answer: Karl Kenny is the CEO of Kraken Robotics Inc.

faq.answer: Kraken Robotics is headquartered in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada.

faq.answer: Kraken's main products include the ThunderFish AUV and advanced sonar systems.
